name: Storm of Fiends
description:
A challenging defense game where you fight to survive as long as possible against never ending waves of fiends.

Inspired by "storm the house"

STORY:

You are Puny, a girl standing against the apocalyptic world on her own. For years she has survived alone, never finding another person to aid her. Anybody she has ever loved has become a zombie, along with everyone else.

Overtime she learned to fight back, hard. She communicates with zombies and they now aid her in defending herself against the never ending waves of fiends against her. Fight against the endless waves and become stronger.
How far can you get?
